COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xa6
STRING: Hmm...?

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xb2
STRING: My eyes were still closed, but my ears pricked up.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xbe
STRING: That definitely sounded like a knock...

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xd2
STRING: Yes, this time I heard it loud and clear.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x150
STRING: I opened my eyes, got out of bed and looked around.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x178
STRING: [Phorni] “You're awake? Someone's knocking on the
door.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x18e
STRING: As if she'd just appeared, Phorni was looking at the
door from the desk with surprise in her eyes.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1a4
STRING: [Chris] “What time is it?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1d6
STRING: [Phorni] “Let's see... Eight in the morning.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1ec
STRING: [Chris] “Who could it be...?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x20a
STRING: [Chris] “Coming! Wait a minute!”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x22e
STRING: I quickly changed and rushed to the door.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x270
STRING: [Chris] “Good morning...?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2a2
STRING: [???] “...Morning, Chris.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2b8
STRING: [Chris] “Uh... Huh?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2ea
STRING: [???] “What's wrong? You look so...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x300
STRING: [Chris] “...Arie?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x326
STRING: [Arie] “Did you forget because we haven't seen each
other for one year?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x33c
STRING: [Chris] “...Arietta.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x36e
STRING: [Arie] “I'm here... I really wanted to see you.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x384
STRING: [Chris] “Oh... Really?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x3b6
STRING: [Arie] “What do you mean, really? I wouldn't be here
otherwise, would I?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x3cc
STRING: Arie smiled, then laughed out loud.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x3f4
STRING: [Arie] “Ha-ha, I wasn't able to come for Natale, so I'm
here now. Work starts the day after tomorrow, so I have
to be back by tomorrow morning.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x41e
STRING: [Chris] “A-Anyway, come in, you must be cold.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x43c
STRING: [Arie] “Thanks.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x45e
STRING: I realized I was getting anxious about this unexpected
visit.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x474
STRING: To calm myself, I asked Arie to come in, and then I was
able to process the situation.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x48a
STRING: I took the small bag that Arie was carrying.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x496
STRING: It contained a day's worth of clothes, so it wasn't heavy.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x4a2
STRING: But it seemed a little bulkier than usual.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x4b8
STRING: I put it down in a corner of the room, then spoke to
Arie.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x4c4
STRING: [Chris] “I'll get you a drink, just take a seat.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x4f6
STRING: [Arie] “Okay. Sorry to surprise you like this.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x528
STRING: [Phorni] “Oh my, how sudden.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x53e
STRING: [Chris] “It's fine, I really don't mind.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x554
STRING: Phorni looked at Arie as if she were some rarity, then
happily stayed by her hand.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x576
STRING: I dragged out the espresso machine and put some
water on to boil for a caffe latte.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x58c
STRING: Along with the water I put the cups into the pot, and
then all I had to do was wait.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x5a2
STRING: In the meantime, I returned to the room and sat down
facing Arie, in order to hear her story.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x5cc
STRING: [Chris] “...Erm, you were able to take time off from the
bakery?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x5ea
STRING: [Arie] “After the last day of work last year, on the 31st, I
took the overnight train here.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x612
STRING: [Arie] “The store opens again on the 3rd, so that's why I
said I had to be back tomorrow morning.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x632
STRING: [Chris] “I see... Sounds tiring.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x664
STRING: [Arie] “I'm sorry.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x67a
STRING: [Chris] “No, it's okay... I'm glad, actually.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x6ac
STRING: [Arie] “He-he, thanks.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x6c2
STRING: [Chris] “But you could've told me... I guess you must've
been busy.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x6fe
STRING: [Arie] “I wrote Torta a short letter... Saying that I'd be
here for New Year's.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x71e
STRING: [Chris] “Hmm? So Torta knew about this...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x748
STRING: Come to think of it, she'd asked me several times about
my plans for today.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x75e
STRING: And then there was the sudden notice that there would
be no practice today, and asking me to play the Fortelle
at home.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x774
STRING: Thinking back, it did seem a little strange.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x780
STRING: [Chris] “Then you could've sent me a letter too...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x7b2
STRING: [Arie] “But I wanted to surprise you, Chris... Was it a
bad idea?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x7c8
STRING: [Chris] “I was really surprised, but... It wasn't a bad idea.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x7fa
STRING: [Arie] “He-he...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x810
STRING: Arie giggled like a little girl, then, as if remembering
something, she slapped her knee.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x842
STRING: [Arie] “Oh, that's right. Happy New Year.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x858
STRING: [Chris] “...Happy New Year.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x88a
STRING: [Arie] “Are you still in shock?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x8a0
STRING: [Chris] “...Yes.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x8d2
STRING: [Arie] “Sorry. This is a little late, but do you have any
plans for today?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x8e8
STRING: [Chris] “Nope. But even if I did, you'd come first.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x924
STRING: [Arie] “Thank you.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x93a
STRING: [Chris] “No more sorry or thanks. I... I'm glad that you're
here.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x962
STRING: [Arie] “I see...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x986
STRING: I heard the water boil behind me, so I stood up.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x992
STRING: I made a caffe latte the same way I did for Torta, and
while in the kitchen I asked Arie a question.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x9a8
STRING: [Chris] “Are you hungry?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x9dc
STRING: [Arie] “No, I had some bread in the train.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x9fa
STRING: [Chris] “Then I guess this will be enough.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xa10
STRING: With two cups in my hands, I came back to my seat.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xa1c
STRING: [Chris] “Here you go.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xa4e
STRING: [Arie] “Thanks... I mean, you're okay with this, right?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xa64
STRING: [Chris] “Yes, yes. You took the same train as always,
yeah? Did you sleep well?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xaa0
STRING: [Arie] “Yes, I'm used to it by now. I'm full of energy for
today.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xac0
STRING: [Chris] “That's good, except that almost all the stores
will be closed today...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xafc
STRING: [Arie] “That's fine, I'm happy just to spend time with
you.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xb2e
STRING: [Phorni] “...Oh, you're blushing.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xb52
STRING: I was about to tell Phorni off, but I was sure that my
face was turning red.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xb68
STRING: I'd missed Arie's voice and smile, they were so
comforting I almost teared up.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xb7e
STRING: [Chris] “But really, this was so sudden.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xbb0
STRING: [Arie] “I wasn't able to see you on Natale, and then your
letter came... I just couldn't control myself.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xbf6
STRING: [Arie] “So I wrote a short letter to Torta. Oh, right.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xc16
STRING: Suddenly Arie retrieved her bag from a corner of the
room and took something out of it.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xc48
STRING: [Arie] “Here you go.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xc5e
STRING: In her hands were the familiar envelope and some kind
of paper bag.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xc74
STRING: [Chris] “This is... A letter?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xca6
STRING: [Arie] “I wrote it at the station, while waiting for the
train. Ah! Don't read it yet, it's embarrassing. Wait until I
leave.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xcd0
STRING: [Chris] “Okay, I will.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xd02
STRING: [Arie] “And this is some bread that I made. Ever since I
started working there, you haven't had any, right?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xd22
STRING: [Chris] “Yeah, though I ate it all the time before I came
here.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xd54
STRING: [Arie] “Three years have passed since then. They're
more delicious now, I think.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xd74
STRING: [Chris] “I can't wait to try them.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xda6
STRING: [Arie] “They'll last for a few days, so eat them as you
like. I left so suddenly, I couldn't bring that many with
me though...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xdd0
STRING: [Chris] “Don't worry, they're quite large. Even if I sliced
them, it'd take me three days to finish them.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xdf8
STRING: [Arie] “But they're good for a month or so, even if you
don't put them in the fridge.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xe18
STRING: [Chris] “Really?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xe36
STRING: [Arie] “There's a yeast known as panettone, and breads
made with it last a really long time. It's a specialty of
ours.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xe56
STRING: [Chris] “Wow, no wonder that bakery is famous.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xe88
STRING: [Arie] “Hehe. It's amazing, isn't it?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xe9e
STRING: [Chris] “I haven't eaten anything yet this morning, so
maybe I'll have some now.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xed0
STRING: [Arie] “You just woke up, didn't you? It's still a little
early.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xee6
STRING: [Chris] “You can tell, huh...? Yeah, I woke up when you
knocked on the door, Arie. Well, now that it's in the
open, can I take a quick shower?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xf2c
STRING: [Arie] “Sure. I'll just rest here for a bit.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xf42
STRING: [Chris] “Thanks. After that, we'll think about what to do
today.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xf6a
STRING: [Arie] “Okay.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xf80
STRING: Even as I said that, I was sure that Arie would find
something to do around the room, so I tried to get her
to truly rest.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xf96
STRING: Getting into the shower, I started to take off my shirt.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xfa2
STRING: [Chris] “Uh... Don't look this way, okay. Just stay put.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xfd4
STRING: [Arie] “Hehe...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1016
STRING: Standing under the hot water, I felt the last remnants of
sleep wash away.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x102c
STRING: I still felt that I hadn't slept enough, but more than that, I
suddenly felt very happy.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1042
STRING: In a short time, many things had happened, Torta
included, and to be honest, there were times when my
feelings seemed to waver.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1058
STRING: But just by being together like this, I truly felt that it was
Arie I loved, after all.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x106e
STRING: Even if this time only came once a year.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x107a
STRING: [Chris] “Huh...?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1090
STRING: I thought I heard some movement outside, but it was
drowned out by the shower, and I couldn't tell if it had
really happened.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x10b0
STRING: Thinking that it was nothing, I stood under the shower
once again.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1100
STRING: While still wet, I opened the bathroom door and
peeked out.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1116
STRING: I'd completely forgotten to lay out a towel for myself.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x112c
STRING: I couldn't possibly ask Phorni for help, I'd just have to
sneak out while Arie was looking away, but when I
looked around the room...

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x114c
STRING: [Chris] “Huh...?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1162
STRING: Arie was nowhere in sight.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x116e
STRING: Seated on the desk, Phorni noticed me and pointed
down.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x117a
STRING: I saw a folded towel by my feet, and I knew that Arie
had put it there.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1190
STRING: Perhaps that was the sound I'd heard?

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x11b8
STRING: [Phorni] “Arie just stepped out. Now's your chance to
get dressed, right?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x11e6
STRING: I put on the same clothes from before, they were still
fresh.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x11f2
STRING: I quickly put on my clothes, and then turned to Phorni.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x11fe
STRING: [Chris] “But, where did she go?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1214
STRING: I went to put my damp towel in the laundry basket, but
it wasn't in its usual place.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x122a
STRING: [Chris] “Huh...?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x125c
STRING: [Phorni] “I think she went to do your laundry.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1272
STRING: [Chris] “...What?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1290
STRING: [Phorni] “She looked really happy, too.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x12a6
STRING: Usually, I did the laundry once, maybe twice a week.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x12b2
STRING: Built for students, my room didn't have space for a
washing machine, or to dry my clothes, even.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x12c8
STRING: Instead, there was a communal washing machine and a
dryer at the end of the hallway.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x12de
STRING: I usually did it on Saturday or Sunday, but I had practice
yesterday, so there must've been a lot of clothes.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x12f4
STRING: [Chris] “...Perhaps I should go after her.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1326
STRING: [Phorni] “Nah. If she's happy doing it, why not?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x133c
STRING: I didn't have any time to think about it, as I heard the
front door open.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x136a
STRING: [Arie] “Oh, you're done. That was fast.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1380
STRING: [Chris] “Yes... But didn't I tell you to do nothing and just
wait here? You must be tired.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x13bc
STRING: [Arie] “Your laundry basket was so full, though...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x13d2
STRING: [Chris] “I was going to do it today.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x13f0
STRING: [Arie] “It's fine, I like doing laundry.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1406
STRING: [Chris] “It's a communal space, what if we run into
someone...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1442
STRING: [Arie] “Run into someone?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1458
STRING: [Chris] “I mean... Oh, right. It doesn't really matter, huh.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x148a
STRING: [Arie] “...Yes, because we're together.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x14a0
STRING: [Chris] “That's right.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x14d2
STRING: [Arie] “Oh, but if I was mistaken for Torta, perhaps
there'd be strange rumors?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x14f2
STRING: [Chris] “That might happen, but nobody here knows
about Torta, so I don't think it'd be a problem.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1530
STRING: [Chris] “But they might be surprised to see an unfamiliar
girl doing laundry in the common area. There are only
male students here, you see.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1562
STRING: [Arie] “So, you mean you haven't told anyone else about
me?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1578
STRING: [Chris] “That's right, aside from Asino, of course.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1596
STRING: [Arie] “What about the other students in this
apartment?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x15ac
STRING: [Chris] “It's not something I'd announce to the world.
Besides...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x15de
STRING: [Arie] “You're not that close to any of them?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x15f4
STRING: Arie got right to the heart of it.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1600
STRING: [Chris] “...You could say that.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1632
STRING: [Arie] “Torta and Asino are still your only friends, I
guess.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1652
STRING: [Chris] “Yeah. Not that I mind.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1684
STRING: [Arie] “Uh-huh.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x169a
STRING: [Chris] “Anyway, are you really not tired at all?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x16b8
STRING: [Arie] “I'm okay.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x16ce
STRING: [Chris] “Wanna go out for a bit?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1700
STRING: [Arie] “Yes, how about going to church?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1716
STRING: [Chris] “Ah, the Mass... It'll probably be on today.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1734
STRING: [Arie] “It doesn't have to be that formal. I just want to
drop by and take a look.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1754
STRING: [Chris] “Okay... That's fine.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1786
STRING: [Arie] “Then why don't you eat some bread first? The
laundry should be done soon; I'll put it in the dryer and
then we can head out.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x17b0
STRING: [Chris] “Got it. I'll have a bit of it.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x17c6
STRING: As I sat down to eat, I caught Phorni's eye.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x17f8
STRING: [Phorni] “It's okay, you can go out by yourselves.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x180e
STRING: Phorni was teasing me, as she sized us both up.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1824
STRING: I mouthed the word “thanks” to her.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x185a
STRING: [Chris] “Are you cold?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x188c
STRING: [Arie] “A little, but I'll be fine.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x18a2
STRING: [Chris] “Well... The rain is actually light today.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x18b8
STRING: Instead of bouncing off the stone pavement, the rain
seemed to be sucked into the ground.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x18ce
STRING: Ever since Natale two years ago, Arie had walked
around the city without an umbrella.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x18e4
STRING: I'd said countless times in my letters that was the norm,
and Arie seemed to be following suit.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1916
STRING: [Arie] “The rain really never stops, does it.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x192c
STRING: [Chris] “No.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x195e
STRING: [Arie] “How does it feel?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1974
STRING: [Chris] “Well... At first I found it annoying, but I got used
to it somehow. When it's like this, I sometimes even
forget that it's raining.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x19ba
STRING: [Arie] “Wow, that's a little bizarre.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x19d0
STRING: [Chris] “I guess.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x19e6
STRING: There was slightly more trash in the streets than usual,
and it was a lot quieter.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x19fc
STRING: Last night, there'd been crowds of young people
partying until late to welcome the New Year, but that
wasn't quite my scene.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1a1c
STRING: Asino wasn't the type to join the crowds either, so it'd
been just like any other holiday.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1a32
STRING: In fact, the shops were all closed until the 3rd, so I had
to brave the crowds for some year-end shopping.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1a50
STRING: [Arie] “What about practice for today?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1a66
STRING: [Chris] “Huh? You mean, for the graduation recital?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1a84
STRING: [Arie] “Yup.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1a9a
STRING: [Chris] “Torta isn't around, and there's no point for me
to practice alone, so I was going to take the day off...
Why?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1ae0
STRING: [Arie] “I kinda want to hear you play the Fortelle, Chris.
Besides, I heard that each day without practice sets you
back three days.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1b0a
STRING: [Chris] “You probably heard that from Torta. Anyway,
you want to hear me play? Should I get Torta?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1b46
STRING: [Arie] “No, can't you play by yourself?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1b5c
STRING: [Chris] “Sure I could, but...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1b8e
STRING: [Arie] “Then that's great. I want it to be just us today.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1ba4
STRING: [Chris] “Yeah, okay.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1bc2
STRING: [Arie] “Good.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1bd8
STRING: Arie beamed with delight.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1c32
STRING: [Arie] “It doesn't look like Mass is being held today.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1c48
STRING: That was Arie's guess from looking at the church.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1c54
STRING: [Chris] “But at least it looks open. The Father must be
really busy, being there for Natale and New Year's.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1c90
STRING: [Arie] “Hehe. By the way, weren't you here with Torta on
Natale?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1ca6
STRING: [Chris] “...Yeah. I actually wanted to come by myself,
though.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1ce2
STRING: [Arie] “No, that's not what I meant.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1cf8
STRING: [Chris] “Ah... Anyway, none of that matters.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1d2a
STRING: [Arie] “Yeah...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1d40
STRING: There was an awkward pause, which I tried to dispel by
raising my voice a little.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1d56
STRING: [Chris] “Anyway, shall we go inside? The Mass hasn't
started yet, it seems.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1d92
STRING: [Arie] “Yeah. Let's head in and pray first.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1da8
STRING: [Chris] “Okay.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1dcc
STRING: The entrance to the church was open, as always.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1dd8
STRING: The Mass today was starting around ten, and the
church was open to all until then.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1dee
STRING: The faithful were already inside, and a family went in as
we were talking.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1e0e
STRING: Walking slightly behind Arie, I went inside.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1e56
STRING: [Arie] “It's less crowded at this time, isn't it?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1e6c
STRING: There were fewer people than expected inside, and the
church felt empty.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1e78
STRING: Aside from the family we saw just now, there were
other people too, of course.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1e8e
STRING: But compared to the size of the building, this group of
thirty or so looked extremely small.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1ea4
STRING: There were no hymns now, and the Father was just
standing in front instead of giving blessings.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1eba
STRING: Inside the church, everyone had their eyes closed in
prayer.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1ec6
STRING: [Chris] “Well then, let's pray too, for a start.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1ef8
STRING: [Arie] “For a start indeed... That's why we're here, of
course.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1f0e
STRING: [Chris] “...Uh-huh.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1f40
STRING: [Arie] “Well, you were just here for Natale, I suppose.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1f56
STRING: Arie laughed, then closed her eyes.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1f6e
STRING: I did the same.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1f7a
STRING: I certainly had a lot to think about right now.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1f86
STRING: Or perhaps it just seemed that way.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1f92
STRING: Spending time with Arie like this, being near enough to
hear her breathe, I felt almost strangely at peace.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1fa8
STRING: I was thinking about Arie rather than praying, when I
heard someone giggling beside me, and I opened my
eyes.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1fe0
STRING: [Chris] “What's the matter?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2012
STRING: [Arie] “That's what I want to know. You're supposed to
be praying, but you just looked so cheerful...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2032
STRING: [Chris] “Cheerful...?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2064
STRING: [Arie] “Grinning... Perhaps that's the best description.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x207a
STRING: ...I suddenly remembered something Phorni had told
me.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2086
STRING: Had I really made that face without knowing it?

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x20b8
STRING: [Arie] “Hehe, shall we head out?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x20ce
STRING: Apparently, she wasn't that interested to begin with in
why I made that face.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x20e4
STRING: With her usual placid smile, Arie started walking out of
the church.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2108
STRING: I had to rush a little to catch up.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x212c
STRING: I remembered having to rush after Torta as well during
Natale.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2142
STRING: Before, Arietta used to be someone who'd walk behind
me.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2158
STRING: People who didn't know her probably found her
reticent, and perhaps even a little gloomy.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x216e
STRING: Of course, Torta and I knew that she wasn't like that.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x217a
STRING: In line with her image, she was, in fact, reserved and
soft-spoken.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2190
STRING: But she definitely had a mind of her own, even if she
didn't insist on things, or force her views on others.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x21a6
STRING: If she had a better idea, or if something was
unacceptable, she'd tell me.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x21bc
STRING: Torta was direct by nature, she was always pulling Arie
and I forward.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x21d2
STRING: Whereas Arie would say shocking truths from time to
time, and lead Torta and I in the right direction without
us realizing it.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x21f2
STRING: That was how I'd differentiated them, but things had
changed after we started living our separate lives far
apart from one another, or so Torta had claimed.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x222e
STRING: [Arie] “Now you're looking troubled. Something on your
mind?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2244
STRING: [Chris] “Sort of.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2276
STRING: [Arie] “Must be about music, I'm sure.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x228c
STRING: [Chris] “...Why?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x22aa
STRING: [Arie] “Because the graduation recital is coming up
soon. Or were you thinking of something else?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x22ca
STRING: [Chris] “...No, you were right, more or less.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x22f4
STRING: Arie and Torta would be the most accurate answer, but
she wasn't wrong.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x230a
STRING: Anyway, it was quite a meaningless thought, so I let it
slide.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2320
STRING: [Chris] “Okay, where to next?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2352
STRING: [Arie] “All the shops are closed, though, aren't they?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2368
STRING: [Chris] “Right. Though if we went to the piazza, we
might find something.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2386
STRING: [Arie] “I'm fine with not going anywhere else, actually.
How about going back to your room?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x23a6
STRING: [Chris] “Sure, as long as you want to.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x23d8
STRING: [Arie] “Then let's chat while we walk home.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x23fc
STRING: I'd thought she was getting tired, but Arie even
managed a cheerful laugh.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2412
STRING: There was a lightness in her step as she walked ahead
of me.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x241e
STRING: [Chris] “Wait up.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2434
STRING: Arie turned around, and I took hold of her hand.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2454
STRING: [Chris] “Let's walk side by side.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2472
STRING: [Arie] “...Okay.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x24ba
STRING: That's how we walked through the city, chatting about
nothing at all. The next thing we knew, it was nearly
noon.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x24d0
STRING: [Chris] “By the way, Arie, aren't you hungry yet?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2502
STRING: [Arie] “Mmm... I'm ready to eat, I think.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2518
STRING: [Chris] “Well, this ristorante looks like it's open...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2538
STRING: We could see from where we were that this open-air
ristorante was open even during the holidays.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x254e
STRING: Normally I'd avoid it because of the high prices, but
surely I could make an exception for today.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2580
STRING: [Arie] “What? We might as well go back home and eat,
right?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x25a0
STRING: [Chris] “...I guess you're right. Shall we pick up the pace
a bit?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x25d2
STRING: [Arie] “Ah, you're the one who's hungry. I made that
bread just for you, Chris, you should've had a bit more
just now.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x25fc
STRING: [Chris] “You said it'd last, so I wanted to spread out my
enjoyment.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2626
STRING: The bread was really delicious, but I'd feel embarrassed
about wolfing it down in front of Arie, so I didn't eat that
much.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x263c
STRING: Of course, I actually did want to spread out my
enjoyment of it too.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2652
STRING: [Chris] “Don't forget, I woke up earlier than usual too.
On days when I have classes, I can last until the
afternoon.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x268e
STRING: [Arie] “It's better to eat three meals a day, you know...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x26a4
STRING: [Chris] “I don't have that much time in the morning.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x26d6
STRING: [Arie] “I know. How about getting Torta to wake you
up? The way I woke you up when we were kids.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x26f6
STRING: [Chris] “Maybe not... Unlike you, I think Torta's methods
would be somewhat violent.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x272a
STRING: The truth was, I had Phorni around to help me when I
just couldn't get out of bed.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2748
STRING: [Arie] “That's mean... I'll tell her you said that.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x275e
STRING: [Chris] “It was a joke. Also, I'm almost never late for
class.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x279a
STRING: [Arie] “When we were kids, you'd always be just in time.
Things don't change.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x27ba
STRING: [Chris] “Not that easily, no.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x27d8
STRING: [Arie] “But, you're not actually that much of a slacker,
strangely enough.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x27f8
STRING: [Chris] “Was that...a compliment?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x282a
STRING: [Arie] “Yes, as intended.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2840
STRING: It didn't sound like a compliment, but Arie smiled as she
said it.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2870
STRING: It was almost noon, and there were quite a lot of
people in the piazza between the Old and New
Districts.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2886
STRING: The stores were still closed, however, so it was just
groups of young people being rowdy.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x289c
STRING: We had no interest in joining them, so we walked on
by, looking at them like they were somebody else's
business.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x28b2
STRING: [Marco] “Oh, it's the student from before.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x28c8
STRING: Perhaps I wasn't used to other people talking to me, but
I only looked in the direction of that voice after Arie
pulled the hem of my shirt.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x28e8
STRING: [Chris] “Huh...? Ah, hello.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x28fe
STRING: It was the old man with the calzone stall, from Natale.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x290a
STRING: [Marco] “Another date today?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2920
STRING: [Chris] “...Uh, no.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2936
STRING: Today's was the only real date, actually.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2942
STRING: [Marco] “No? You two look like you get along.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2974
STRING: [Arie] “Erm... Chris?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x298a
STRING: [Chris] “I was here with Torta, you know, on Natale.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x29a0
STRING: In last week's letter, I'd told her about spending Natale
with Torta, but I didn't mention the calzones, somehow.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x29c4
STRING: [Marco] “Hmm?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x29da
STRING: [Chris] “Uh... Last time, I was here with her twin sister.
This one's my real girlfriend.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x29fa
STRING: I decided that both Arie and I would feel more at ease if
I just set the record straight, which was what I did in
the end.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2a10
STRING: [Marco] “Who'd have thought... They look just alike.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2a26
STRING: [Chris] “Well, that goes without saying.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2a3c
STRING: [Marco] “So, do you want something to eat? The little
lady here hasn't had one yet, right?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2a5c
STRING: [Chris] “Huh? ...Erm, what do you want to do?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2a8e
STRING: [Arie] “I'm okay with anything, Chris.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2aa4
STRING: [Chris] “I see... In that case, let's eat here. Cooking will
be a hassle, and it was tasty last time.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2acc
STRING: [Arie] “Okay.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2b04
STRING: [Marco] “Things are different when you're an actual
couple, eh?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2b1a
STRING: [Chris] “Huh?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2b30
STRING: [Marco] “Sorry about last time. You'll be fine, so keep it
up! Two calzones, then?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2b50
STRING: [Chris] “Ah, sure...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2b66
STRING: Sorry... Was he referring to his comments last time,
about being obedient?

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2b7c
STRING: [Marco] “Here you go.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2b9a
STRING: [Arie] “Thank you.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2bb0
STRING: From behind me, Arie's voice sounded a little absent.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2bc6
STRING: [Chris] “Let's sit down and eat over there.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2bf8
STRING: [Arie] “Okay.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2c46
STRING: We bought drinks from somewhere else, then sat down
on the fountain's edge.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2c52
STRING: Going to church, sitting by the fountain, chatting...

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2c5e
STRING: It was really just like Natale all over again, which was a
little strange.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2c74
STRING: I'd spent Natale with Torta instead of Arie, and now I
was with Arie for New Year's, not by myself as I usually
was.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2c8a
STRING: To the old man, it probably looked like I was doing
almost the same things with two people who looked
almost the same.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2ca0
STRING: [Chris] “How is it?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2cd2
STRING: [Arie] “Mmm, it's really good.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2cfc
STRING: Arie was eating it carefully, so that the tomato sauce
wouldn't drip.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2d12
STRING: That reminded me of the differences between them.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2d1e
STRING: But then again, it wasn't as if the other one had really
enjoyed her meal here.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2d34
STRING: Arie would get mad if she found out, so I quickly
banished that memory and turned to face her.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2d4a
STRING: [Chris] “What should we do now?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2d7c
STRING: [Arie] “I want to hear you play the Fortelle, Chris. Shall
we go home?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2d9c
STRING: [Chris] “Hmm... Guess that's the only thing to do.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2dce
STRING: [Arie] “You don't want to?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2de4
STRING: [Chris] “I do, it's been a long time.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2e16
STRING: [Arie] “Yes, I haven't heard you play in forever.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2e2c
STRING: Arie sounded very pleased.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2e38
STRING: At this point, I had no other choice.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2e44
STRING: [Chris] “Alright.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2e62
STRING: [Arie] “Hehe. Okay, I'll finish this quickly... ＊gulp＊”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2e78
STRING: With a smile, Arie all but inhaled the last mouthful of her
calzone.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2e9c
STRING: I took the paper wrapping from Arie as we walked past
the stall.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2ed2
STRING: [Chris] “Thanks again.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2f04
STRING: [Arie] “It was really delicious.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2f1a
STRING: We thanked the old man, and I threw the waste paper
into the trash can.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2f30
STRING: [Marco] “Come back any time. Though if you stayed a
while longer, you'd get to hear me play the accordion...

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2f50
STRING: [Chris] “Ha-ha, yeah, we have to do that again
sometime.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2f82
STRING: [Arie] “Thank you very much.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2f98
STRING: [Marco] “Take care.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2fbc
STRING: With that, the robust old man returned to his calzones.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2fd2
STRING: Looking around, it seemed that business was pretty
good, though perhaps a little slower than Natale.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2fe8
STRING: Whether it was because everywhere was closed, or he
knew how to get customers, who knew.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2ffe
STRING: I wanted to come again, if I had the chance, but... It'd
probably be with someone other than Arietta.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x301e
STRING: I quickly put aside that thought, and resolved to forget
all about the calzone stall.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x3066
STRING: [Chris] “I'm home.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x3098
STRING: [Arie] “Me too.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x30ae
STRING: [Chris] “Ah, wait here.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x30d2
STRING: I went to get two towels, as I'd forgotten to lay them
out earlier.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x30de
STRING: Sensing that it'd be inconvenient for towels to magically
appear while we were out, Phorni hadn't done so today.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x30f4
STRING: The rain wasn't that heavy, but we'd walked quite a bit,
and even our hair was dripping wet.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x310a
STRING: Arie was wearing her long hair down, which made it
even worse.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x3120
STRING: I should've laid them out before we left, but I was used
to Phorni doing it for me, so I always forgot.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x3140
STRING: [Chris] “Here you go.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x3156
STRING: I dried my hair and shook off the raindrops from my
body, then I went inside.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x316c
STRING: Behind me, Arie was doing the same.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x3178
STRING: It was a pain, but no one used umbrellas in this city, so
this had to be done.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x318e
STRING: [Chris] “Alright... Time for the Fortelle?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x31c0
STRING: [Arie] “Yes, please. How about... The song for your
recital?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x31d6
STRING: [Chris] “Huh? You said you wanted to hear your
favorites.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x31f4
STRING: [Arie] “Well, I thought it'd be nice to hear what you'll
perform with Torta at the graduation recital.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x3214
STRING: [Chris] “But, there's a vocal part as well...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x3246
STRING: [Arie] “So you can't play it?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x325c
STRING: [Chris] “No... I can play it, but it might not be that
interesting by itself.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x32a0
STRING: [Phorni] “Welcome back. That was fast.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x32b6
STRING: Phorni suddenly appeared on the desk, looking very
amused.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x32d4
STRING: [Phorni] “What's the matter? Are you embarrassed? Or
is it because you're always practicing it with Torta?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x32f4
STRING: That was part of it, to be sure.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x3300
STRING: I couldn't talk back to Phorni, so I tapped her lightly on
the forehead.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x333a
STRING: [Phorni] “Hey?!”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x3350
STRING: Phorni wasn't going to give up that easily.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x3378
STRING: [Phorni] “What was that for, you dummy! Hit the nail on
the head, didn't I?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x338e
STRING: [Chris] “...Yeah.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x33c0
STRING: [Arie] “Huh?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x33f2
STRING: [Phorni] “Huh?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x3408
STRING: [Chris] “Nothing.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x341e
STRING: I didn't mean to say that out loud, but apparently I did.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x3434
STRING: With my eyes, I apologized to Phorni.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x3440
STRING: [Chris] “Sorry.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x346a
STRING: [Phorni] “...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x3480
STRING: Phorni fell silent, then whispered her reply.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x3494
STRING: [Phorni] “Nah, I'm sorry too. I seem to be in the way, so
I'll disappear for now.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x34ca
STRING: Before I could say anything, Phorni had vanished.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x34de
STRING: [Arie] “Hmm? So, what'll it be?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x34f4
STRING: [Chris] “Anything you want, really.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x350a
STRING: Given the situation, there was no way I'd be able to talk
to Phorni now.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x3520
STRING: Perhaps she'd appear again at night.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x352c
STRING: It wouldn't be too late to say a proper apology then.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x3538
STRING: [Chris] “So... You really want to hear the graduation
recital piece?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x356a
STRING: [Arie] “If you don't want to, then that's fine too.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x3580
STRING: [Chris] “Like I said, that's not the issue. The parts where
Torta sings the melody, they might sound a bit empty,
that's all.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x35c6
STRING: [Arie] “Oh, if that's what you mean, I don't mind.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x35dc
STRING: [Chris] “Or perhaps you could try singing it?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x360e
STRING: [Arie] “Excuse me...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x3624
STRING: [Chris] “Ha-ha, just kidding.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x3656
STRING: [Arie] “Hmph! You didn't have to rule it out that quickly,
you know...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x366c
STRING: [Chris] “Well then, shall we practice? We might get
somewhere, in a couple of hours.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x36a8
STRING: [Arie] “No we won't, and you'd know that best of all.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x36be
STRING: [Chris] “But it's been three years, hasn't it? Do you still
practice? You do have a piano at home...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x36e6
STRING: [Arie] “...Now you're just making fun of me.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x36fc
STRING: [Chris] “Not at all. It's just...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x372e
STRING: [Arie] “Hmm? Just what?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x3744
STRING: [Chris] “I was just thinking, maybe you've gotten better
at singing, somehow.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x3764
STRING: In particular, it seemed that Torta and Arie were
becoming more alike, that was all.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x3796
STRING: [Arie] “...Okay, but I'm sorry to disappoint. I've been
busy at the bakery, so I haven't practiced at all.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x37b6
STRING: [Chris] “Do you plan to?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x37e8
STRING: [Arie] “I'd only get laughed at by a certain someone.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x37fe
STRING: [Chris] “I won't laugh.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x381c
STRING: [Arie] “You did, when we were kids.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x3832
STRING: [Chris] “That's all in the past.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x3864
STRING: [Arie] “But... I'll pass. I'll be happy just listening.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x387a
STRING: [Chris] “Ha-ha, I thought you'd say that. You do enjoy
listening.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x38b6
STRING: [Arie] “As for singing... Torta will do that in my place.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x38cc
STRING: [Chris] “...In your place?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x38fe
STRING: [Arie] “In place of that, I'll make food for you.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x391c
STRING: [Arie] “So play the Fortelle, Chris.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x3932
STRING: [Chris] “...Okay, I will.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x3956
STRING: Without saying anything else, I sat in front of the
Fortelle.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x3962
STRING: With Arie watching me, I felt a positive kind of anxiety,
and was ready to perform.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x3978
STRING: [Chris] “For a start, I'll play something off the top of my
head. After all, we won't stop there, will we?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x39b4
STRING: [Arie] “...Okay.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x39de
STRING: It was a nostalgic song.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x39ea
STRING: The song that came to mind was a simple one, the very
first one Torta, Arie and I learned to play at that music
school.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x3a0a
STRING: Arie was off-key.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x3a16
STRING: Torta was keeping up, somehow.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x3a22
STRING: And I was desperately following the score with my eyes.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x3a2e
STRING: It would've been more effective to practice different
songs for voice and Fortelle, but we'd insisted on
performing together.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x3a4e
STRING: It wasn't a performance to be proud of, but after we'd
stumbled to the end, we laughed at ourselves and were
satisfied.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x3a64
STRING: It was an important memory, the very first song we
practiced, and even after all those years, my fingers
were almost moving by themselves.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x3a84
STRING: As I played the last note, I saw that Arie's eyes were
narrowed, as if in reminiscence.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x3a9a
STRING: After the song ended, she looked dissatisfied and tilted
her head to one side.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x3ac2
STRING: [Arie] “That was the easiest song, right?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x3ad8
STRING: [Chris] “I just thought of it for some reason. Anyway, I
have to play quite a lot of songs, don't I?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x3b14
STRING: [Arie] “Until I start making dinner, yes.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x3b2a
STRING: That meant three or four hours of playing, I guess.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x3b36
STRING: It was much less than practicing with Torta from ten in
the morning, but playing for Arie made me a little
anxious, and I suspected I'd be more tired than usual.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x3b56
STRING: [Chris] “It's not as if I'm practicing new songs all the
time. I'll just play what comes to mind, give me a break.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x3b7e
STRING: [Arie] “Ha-ha, okay.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x3b94
STRING: [Chris] “Thanks. Easy songs would be great to start
with, so I'll try to recall what we learned back then...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x3bd0
STRING: [Arie] “Does that mean you only want to play easy
songs?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x3bf0
STRING: [Chris] “For a start, yes. We've got a long way to go.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x3c22
STRING: [Arie] “Okay, if you say so.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x3c38
STRING: [Chris] “Alright then.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x3c62
STRING: Looking back on the past...

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x3c6e
STRING: Recalling how things were back then, I turned to face
the Fortelle once again.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x3cb0
STRING: [Chris] “Phew...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x3cc6
STRING: I let out a long sigh, then stretched my shoulders.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x3cd2
STRING: It was a little past five, according to the clock.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x3cde
STRING: I'd taken many small breaks in between, to get a drink,
or to chat with Arie about the past.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x3cf4
STRING: Even so, I was starting to feel exhausted.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x3d00
STRING: During those breaks, Arie had done many small things
for me, like getting my clothes from the dryer.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x3d16
STRING: [Chris] “Guess it's about time...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x3d2c
STRING: Whatever Arie was planning to make, I suppose she
had to start preparations soon.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x3d5e
STRING: [Arie] “Phew... That was great.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x3d74
STRING: [Chris] “Kind of tiring, though.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x3da6
STRING: [Arie] “Hehe. But we're not done yet, surely?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x3dbc
STRING: [Chris] “There's no avoiding it, is there?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x3dda
STRING: [Arie] “Of course there is. But I trust that you'll play it for
me.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x3dfa
STRING: [Chris] “Sure, sure. That's what I intend to do.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x3e10
STRING: When she said it like that, with her smile and all, I
couldn't say no.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x3e26
STRING: Torta would do it consciously, but in Arie's case she
truly believed it, which made it even more underhanded.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x3e3c
STRING: [Chris] “Okay, this'll be the last song for today.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x3e6e
STRING: [Arie] “Sure.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x3e92
STRING: At that point, I didn't need the score anymore.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x3e9e
STRING: But somehow I felt like having it there, so I took it from
my bag and placed it on the stand.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x3eb4
STRING: However... This score, which was full of annotations,
now seemed a little problematic.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x3eca
STRING: Arie would take one look at a phrase like “Stay in sync,”
and recognize Torta's writing right away.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x3eea
STRING: ...That was the song that I was about to play.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x3f18
STRING: From the very first note, a wave of sound poured from
the Fortelle that moved me deeply.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x3f2e
STRING: My fingers ran across the keyboard, and I lost myself in
the music.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x3f3a
STRING: This was probably the first song I had ever practiced so
seriously.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x3f50
STRING: Everything else I'd played today had simply been drilled
into muscle memory through endless, repeated
practice.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x3f70
STRING: But this song was different.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x3f7c
STRING: The sounds had entered my subconscious, and they
were being released into the world through my fingers
and a kind of magic.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x3f92
STRING: ...And then there was this feeling.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x3f9e
STRING: The feeling that I was watching myself playing the
Fortelle.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x3fb4
STRING: The two seemed linked by a single thread, and at the
same time they seemed like different beings from the
very beginning.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x3fca
STRING: Separate, and connected.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x3fd6
STRING: The solid keys felt real and distinct to my fingertips, and
yet somewhere, they were out of focus.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x4008
STRING: The vibrations of the Fortelle's last note melted away in
the air.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x401e
STRING: I felt a strange sense of accomplishment, as if the actual
recital were over.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x4034
STRING: I looked at Arie, seeking a response.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x4048
STRING: [Chris] “How was it?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x4082
STRING: [Arie] “You don't have to ask, do you? You look really
pleased, Chris.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x4098
STRING: [Chris] “...I'm asking you what you thought of it, Arie.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x40d4
STRING: [Arie] “You know that as well, I'm sure.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x40ea
STRING: [Chris] “That's true. But then again, you've never said
anything bad about my playing.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x4126
STRING: [Arie] “That's because I...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x413c
STRING: [Chris] “Even if singing isn't your forte, you've heard a lot
of music, haven't you? Sometimes I just want to know
how it compares to all of that.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x4178
STRING: [Arie] “Even compared to everything I heard, that was
great.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x418e
STRING: [Chris] “Thanks, Arie. You often say nice things about
my music, but I don't think I've ever felt this happy.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x41b6
STRING: [Arie] “...Silly boy.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x41cc
STRING: Sounding a little embarrassed, Arie stood up and
looked at the kitchen.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x41fe
STRING: [Arie] “Alright, I should start preparing dinner. What
ingredients do we have?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x421e
STRING: [Chris] “I stocked up at the end of last year, so you'll
probably find what you need.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x4246
STRING: [Arie] “Let me take a look...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x426a
STRING: I'd bought enough meat and vegetables for a week's
worth of meals.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x4280
STRING: The shops weren't open because of New Year's, but I
cooked for myself on Sundays anyway.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x4296
STRING: After surveying the fridge, Arie came back to the room.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x42be
STRING: [Arie] “We've got meat and eggplants, so... I guess I'll
make parmigiana. It's a special recipe I learned from
Grandma.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x42de
STRING: [Chris] “That sounds great. But recently I've been eating
lots of food prepared by Ninna, so my standards may be
a little high.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x431a
STRING: [Arie] “That's fine. Cooking is my forte, after all.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x4330
STRING: [Chris] “I'm counting on it. Can I help with anything?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x434e
STRING: [Arie] “No, just sit and wait. You could always practice,
if you have nothing else to do.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x436e
STRING: [Chris] “Meh. I'm kinda tired...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x43a0
STRING: [Arie] “Okay then, you'll practice, and I'll cook.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x43b6
STRING: Arie spoke with great confidence, implying that this was
her field of expertise.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x43da
STRING: She rolled up her sleeves and walked happily into the
kitchen.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x43e6
STRING: It seemed Phorni had no intention of reappearing while
Arie was here.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x43fc
STRING: I really had nothing else to do, so as Arie suggested, I
started playing the song for my graduation recital.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x4458
STRING: A pleasing aroma had already filled the room.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x4464
STRING: But I didn't turn around, I kept playing.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x4470
STRING: The song was almost over, and I decided to play it
through to the end.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x4496
STRING: Over a month had passed since I started practicing this
song.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x44ac
STRING: I knew it so well, my hands were moving almost
automatically.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x44c2
STRING: It was definitely the first time I'd ever spent so much
time on a single song, lessons included.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x44da
STRING: Throughout that time I'd been with Torta and listened
to her sing, and that would continue until the
graduation recital.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x450a
STRING: Just behind me, I heard the sound of plates and spoons
being placed on the desk.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x453e
STRING: [Torta] “...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x4554
STRING: I kept playing the Fortelle.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x457e
STRING: [Torta] “Watch out now, it's still hot.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x4594
STRING: [Chris] “Ah... Okay, Torta.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x45e2
STRING: [Arie] “Huh...?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x45f8
STRING: [Chris] “Uh... Nothing.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x460e
STRING: It certainly felt as if Torta had been standing there.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x461a
STRING: But that was Arietta, without a doubt, who was staring
at me with a look of shock on her face.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x4630
STRING: [Chris] “Uh... I could hear the singing in my head, and
so I, you know, made that mistake.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x4664
STRING: My voice sounded a little hollow.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x4670
STRING: I didn't mean to, but I knew I'd said something that hurt
Arie's feelings.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x4686
STRING: Was it because I'd spent so much time with Torta?

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x4692
STRING: And I'd been so sure that I would never make that
mistake, ever...

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x469e
STRING: Arie looked away and stood absolutely still.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x46aa
STRING: [Chris] “S-Sorry.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x46dc
STRING: [Arie] “I... I'll be leaving now.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x46f2
STRING: Arie's voice trembled as she picked up her bag from a
corner of the room.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x4716
STRING: [Chris] “W-Wait a minute.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x4748
STRING: [Arie] “I told Torta in my letter that I'll be staying at
Grandma's tonight, so it's okay.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x4768
STRING: [Chris] “That's not what I'm...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x479a
STRING: [Arie] “The parmigiana will taste good even after it
cools down.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x47b0
STRING: [Chris] “Wait!”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x47d8
STRING: As Arie reached for the doorknob, I grabbed her other
hand.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x4804
STRING: Without saying anything, Arie looked into my eyes.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x4810
STRING: Perhaps even she wasn't aware of it, but tears had
gathered in her eyes.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x4826
STRING: Arie remained perfectly still, her expressionless face
broken only by her blinking.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x4832
STRING: In that moment, tears fell on her cheeks.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x483e
STRING: She was crying.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x484a
STRING: Arie probably did feel insecure, after all.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x4856
STRING: Even if she said that she was fine with me and Torta,
there was probably some part of her that just couldn't
deal with it.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x486c
STRING: The relationships between the three of us seemed
clear-cut, but there were complicated issues too.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x4882
STRING: I wasn't delusional, but I was pretty sure that for a time,
Torta had liked me.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x4898
STRING: I'd liked both of them, but the day I realized that wasn't
sustainable...

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x48ae
STRING: I made a choice.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x48ba
STRING: Of course, Arie knew about all that.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x48c6
STRING: But that didn't change anything between Arie and Torta.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x48d2
STRING: Still...

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x48de
STRING: [Chris] “...Sorry.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x48fc
STRING: [Arie] “...Okay.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x4912
STRING: I slowly let go of her hand.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x494a
STRING: [Arie] “Still, I'm going to go now.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x4960
STRING: With tears still in her eyes, Arie stood her ground.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x4976
STRING: At that moment, no one in the world could've gotten
her to change her mind.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x498c
STRING: I knew that from our many years together.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x4998
STRING: [Chris] “I'll walk you home.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x49b6
STRING: [Arie] “...It's okay.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x49cc
STRING: [Chris] “It's not okay.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x49e2
STRING: I wasn't going to give in, either.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x4a0a
STRING: [Arie] “...Fine.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x4a52
STRING: We walked along the dark streets of the city at night,
while I stared at Arie's back.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x4a5e
STRING: I knew that she'd avoid me if I tried to walk beside her,
so I trailed behind her instead.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x4a74
STRING: [Chris] “You're going back tomorrow, right? I'd like to
see you off at the station.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x4aa6
STRING: [Arie] “No, tomorrow I'll be fine on my own, really.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x4abc
STRING: [Chris] “I want to see you off.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x4afc
STRING: Her silence was heartbreaking, and I couldn't say
anything else.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x4b2c
STRING: In the end, I walked her all the way to Ninna's house,
but Arie didn't turn around once.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x4b42
STRING: As I took my leave, she whispered something.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x4b6a
STRING: [Arie] “Ten in the morning.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x4b80
STRING: [Chris] “Huh?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x4b9e
STRING: [Arie] “That's when my train leaves.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x4bd2
STRING: After some time, I realized that she was showing
forgiveness, in her own way.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x4bde
STRING: [Chris] “Got it! ... I'll be there!”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x4bf4
STRING: She probably couldn't have heard me through the door,
but I said it anyway, then went back to my room.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x4c42
STRING: On the way home my feet felt heavy, and that's why I
got extra wet in the rain.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x4c58
STRING: I was dripping all over the floor in the doorway.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x4c64
STRING: Against all expectations, a towel had been laid out, and
I looked around the room.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x4c70
STRING: [Chris] “...Phorni?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x4c86
STRING: But there was no one in sight.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x4c92
STRING: If she was trying to make me feel better, she should've
made fun of me instead...

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x4ca8
STRING: I buried my face in the soft towel, soaking up all the
rain.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x4cbe
STRING: [Chris] “Thanks, Phorni.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x4cd4
STRING: I called out to her again upon entering the room, but
she didn't show any sign of appearing.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x4cea
STRING: I threw the towel into the basket with some force, then
looked at the food on the desk.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x4d00
STRING: The parmigiana and bread were laid out side by side,
and they looked delicious.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x4d16
STRING: I tried a mouthful of the parmigiana.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x4d22
STRING: [Chris] “This tastes great...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x4d38
STRING: It went without saying that the recipe came from her
grandmother, but Arie executed it so well, it tasted just
like Ninna's.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x4d4e
STRING: If Arie were here, she'd take that as a compliment, but
there was no one to hear it.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x4d64
STRING: Even so, I had almost zero appetite.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x4d70
STRING: I covered the food with a kitchen towel, and decided to
eat some tomorrow morning.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x4d86
STRING: Phorni still didn't show any sign of appearing, so I
collapsed into bed without changing.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x4d9c
STRING: She was okay with me seeing her off, which meant that
she had more or less forgiven me, right?

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x4db2
STRING: If she were really mad at me, she could've just not told
me the time.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x4dc8
STRING: Still, that didn't solve anything at all.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x4dde
STRING: Resolving to make another sincere apology tomorrow, I
closed my eyes.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x4dfc
STRING: [Chris] “Phorni. Wake me up at nine tomorrow morning,
if possible.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x4e12
STRING: Until then, I had to think of why I made that mistake...
Or some kind of excuse for it.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x4e38
STRING: [Phorni] “Okay, okay, not like I have a choice...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x4e4e
STRING: It was comforting to hear Phorni's cheerful voice.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x4e62
STRING: [Chris] “Thanks.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x4e78
STRING: Utterly exhausted both mentally and physically, I feel
asleep right away.
